original: 蘇祁邑夷族首領，其妻乃漢嘉郡旄牛夷首領之女。冬逢與其弟隗渠等降蜀後又反叛，張嶷率眾討伐，誅殺冬逢。
text: The leader of the Yi people in Suqiyi, and his wife is the daughter of the leader of Yanniu Yi in Hanjia County. Dongfeng and his younger brother Wei Qu and others rebelled after they descended to Shu, Zhang Yi led a conquest to punish Dongfeng.
